main event: A bright, oval-shaped object was spotted by three teenagers in Little Rock, Arkansas on March 22, 1967.
interesting points: The object was the size of an automobile and had a brilliant white color.
The object had a bubble or canopy on top and emitted a faint buzzing sound.
The object was observed for 30-35 seconds as it moved north-northeast and then disappeared over the horizon.
The object seemed to fly towards the observers, then slow down before increasing speed and moving off to the left.
The observers were interviewed and found to be sincere in their belief that they saw a UFO, but no other evidence could be found to substantiate the sighting.
